import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useWeb3 } from '../contexts/Web3Context'; import { documentAPI, daoAPI } from '../utils/api'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const { connected, account, connectWallet } = useWeb3(); const [documents, setDocuments] = useState([]); const [daos, setDaos] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); // Fetch user documents and DAOs useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { setLoading(true); try { // Fetch documents const documentsResult = await documentAPI.getUserDocuments(); if (documentsResult.success) { setDocuments(documentsResult.data); } // Fetch DAOs const daosResult = await daoAPI.getUserDAOs(); if (daosResult.success) { setDaos(daosResult.data); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); setError('Failed to load dashboard data. Please try again.'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchData(); }, []); // Handle connect wallet const handleConnectWallet = async () => { try { await connectWallet(); } catch (error) { console.error('Error connecting wallet:', error); } }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (

Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.username}!

{/* Wallet Connection Status */}

Wallet Status

{connected ? (

Wallet Connected

{account}

) : (

Connect your wallet to interact with the blockchain features.

)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Generate Document Review Contract Create DAO Legal Chatbot
{/* Recent Documents */}

Recent Documents

Create New
{documents.length > 0 ? (
{documents.map((document) => ( ))}
Title Type Created Status Actions
{document.title} {document.documentType} {new Date(document.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()} {document.blockchainTxHash ? ( On-chain ) : ( Local )} View
) : (

No documents

Get started by creating a new document.

New Document
)}
{/* My DAOs */}

My DAOs

Create New
{daos.length > 0 ? (
{daos.map((dao) => (
{dao.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}

{dao.name}

{dao.description}

))}
) : (

No DAOs

Get started by creating a new DAO.

New DAO
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
